item.title: ADT
item.description: score:27 Chances: ADT has seen solid earnings estimate revision activity over the past month ADT Inc. beats earnings expectations The company has announced a dividend increase from last year Risks: The company is undergoing a secondary public offering, which may dilute existing shareholders The threat of a recession could impact the stock price Score:27 chances characters count - risks characters count = 27
